hd.net.pre: <html><head><script>h = '[]';form = '{\"operationName\":\"movie_slug\",\"variables\":{\"slug\":\"';form += location.href.match('pelicula/(.*)/')[1];form += '\"},\"query\": \"fragment MovieFields on Show {\\n  id\\n  title\\n  type\\n  originalTitle\\n  overview\\n  coverPath\\n  year\\n  slug\\n  year\\n  viewCount\\n  duration\\n  popularity\\n  voteCount\\n  voteAverage\\n  slugAliases\\n  premiere\\n  active\\n  trailer\\n  cast {\\n    name\\n    __typename\\n  }\\n  genres {\\n    id\\n    slug\\n    name\\n    __typename\\n  }\\n  country {\\n    name\\n    __typename\\n  }\\n  gallery {\\n    type\\n    photoPath\\n    backdrop\\n    __typename\\n  }\\n  quality {\\n    type\\n    language\\n    __typename\\n  }\\n  __typename\\n}\\n\\nquery movie_slug($slug: String) {\\n  show(slug: $slug, type: \\"movie\\") {\\n    ...MovieFields\\n    __typename\\n  }\\n}\\n\"}';window.HTMLOUT.usepost('https://api.esplay.one/graphql', form, h, true, true, '');</script></head><body></body></html>

hd.net.post: ';encode = atob(encode);id = encode.match('\"id\":\"(.*)\",\"title')[1];;form = '{    \"operationName\": \"queryVideos\",    \"variables\": {        \"itemId\": \"';form += id;form += '\"    },    \"query\": \"query queryVideos($itemId: String!) {\\n  videos(itemId: $itemId) {\\n    language\\n    url\\n    quality\\n    sandbox\\n    type\\n    server\\n    updatedAt\\n    status\\n    __typename\\n  }\\n}\\n\"}';window.HTMLOUT.usepost('https://api.esplay.one/graphql', form, h, true, true, '');</script></head><body></body></html>

';encode = atob(encode);object = JSON.parse(encode);array = object['data']['videos'];for (let index = 0; index < array.length; index++) {    lang = array[index]['language'];    if (lang == 'lat') {        lang = 'Latino';    }else if (lang == 'sub') {        lang = 'Subtitulado';    }else{        lang = 'Castellano';    }    url = array[index]['url'];  window.HTMLOUT.sendElement(url, lang);}window.HTMLOUT.finalizar();</script></head><body></body></html>
